description: No Nonsense Neovim Client in Rust
installer: "if (Test-Path -Path $env:SCOOP\apps\neovim -PathType Container") {Move-Item -Path $dir\$file -Destination $env:SCOOP\apps\neovim} else {Write-Host -Object "Please install neovim first" -ForegroundColor Red -BackgroundColor White}; exit"
uninstaller:
"if (Test-Path -Path $env:SCOOP\apps
eovim -PathType Container") {Remove-Item -Path $dir\$file -Destination $env:SCOOP\apps
eovim
eovide.exe -Force} else {Write-Host -Object "Program neovide doesn't exist" -ForegroundColor Red -BackgroundColor White}; exit"
